ModMetaData:
EPOE: Rebalanced XeoNovaDan https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=34572.0 0.17.1557 <<<<<<< HEAD Current Version: v1.0.1

Extensively rebalances items from EPOE:
* Re-factors most recipes and market values
* Any part above 'Basic' tier also needs the intellectual skill to be crafted
* All appropriate parts use the part efficiency model as opposed to capacity offsets.
* Various parts (e.g. power arms) have been re-balanced too
* Workbench building is less material and more component intensive ======= Current Version: v1.0
